title: ‘I Wanted to Race the Giro’: Why Mattias Skjelmose Is Not Stoked to Be Going to the Tour de France
content:
Lidl-Trek's mountain man reluctantly heads to France to face the 'Big 4' in wild reversal of team priority versus personal ambition.

Read the full article at ‘I Wanted to Race the Giro’: Why Mattias Skjelmose Is Not Stoked to Be Going to the Tour de France on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
